overview:
Don Care joined WebCollage in May 2006. Don brings 20 years of software development, quality assurance, process and services experience to WebCollage.

At Cheyenne Software, Don was Vice President of R&D for the Cheyenne Netware backup, antivirus and communications product lines and provided process and technology improvements to support the companyâ€™s fast growth.

Following an acquisition, Don was Senior Vice President of R&D at Computer Associates and led the development of the communications product line, and Release QA organization.

Most recently, Don led IT and service operations at Enterasys Networks during the companyâ€™s refocus to secure networks.

Don has a bachelorâ€™s degree in electrical engineering technology from Penn State University.

relationships.title: Executive Vice President, Technology and Services
